name: Allen ADELMAN and Anita Adelman H/W, Petitioners, v. Giovanni CONIGLIARO and Josephine Mannino and Rent-A-Car, Respondents

parties: Allen ADELMAN and Anita Adelman H/W, Petitioners, v. Giovanni CONIGLIARO and Josephine Mannino and Rent-A-Car, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 16th day of February 1999, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is REVERSED, and this matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court for disposition consistent with this Court’s decision in Washington v. Baxter, 719 A.2d 733 (Pa.1998).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
723 A.2d 184
Allen ADELMAN and Anita Adelman H/W, Petitioners, v. Giovanni CONIGLIARO and Josephine Mannino and Rent-A-Car, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 16, 1999.
